translations: 使偏（deflect 的 ing 形式）；打歪

sentences.translation: 这常常需要略带幽默感的委婉解释。

sentences.sentence: They work by either chemically absorbing UV rays or deflecting and bouncing them off your body.
sentences.translation: 它们的工作原理要么是含有能吸收紫外线的化学物质，要么是使紫外线折射或色散，避开你的身体。

sentences.sentence: Biological material can be difficult to image in ordinary TEMs because electrons pass through it without deflecting.
sentences.translation: 普通显微镜在探测生物材料时，因为电子通过材料不偏转而不易呈像。
